mail.title: [Knowledge] Registration to event {KnowledgeId} - {KnowledgeTitle}
mail.description:
System will notify the user who registered for participation.
[Reserved keywords] If you write the following keywords in the body, replace the value when sending mail.
- {URL} : Access URL to Knowledge - {KnowledgeId} : ID - {KnowledgeTitle} : Title - {Status} : Status
